metadata.name: Joye
metadata.description: “The Mushroom Kids” is a collection of 69 pieces of artwork by Dancing Triangle (stylized as 💃🏾🔺) and is their  genesis collection on the Ethereum Network. 31% of all sales are going into a wallet which will be used to fund donations to RHIZE, who’s mission “is prototyping systems for an ecosystem of local resilience with people and planet at the center. [Their] solutions are rooted in purpose, inspired by place & designed to share.” Learn more at https://themushroom.farm/donate
